original_text: And it came to pass in those days, that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was baptized of John in Jordan.
korean_text: 그 때에 예수께서 갈릴리 나사렛으로부터 와서 요단 강에서 요한에게 세례를 받으시고

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in those days
that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee
and was baptized of John in Jordan
